remarks: Obsolete version of ~ ismgm as of 3-Feb-2020.  The predicate "is a magma".  (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
ismgmOLD.1 $e |- X = dom dom G $.
ismgmOLD $p |- ( G e. A -> ( G e. Magma <-> G : ( X X. X ) --> X ) ) $.
